new.namespace: create namespace [name] for application: default namespace "App"
new.template: create files with template [name] for application: default template "clean"
server: start server with observer to automatically build and livereload
server.noInit: only build application no init server
build: compiles templates and builds the app
generate.usage:
[options] [name]

    [name]    the under_score name of your object
    [fields]  field:type pairs, ex: 'name:string age:number broke:boolean'
    [options] can be combined
generate.scaffold: scaffolds full CRUD for a model
precompile: precompile templates from src dir to target dir (short-cut alias: "p")
